verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Years I spent in vanity and pride, Caring not my Lord was crucified, Knowing not it was for me He died On Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mercy there is great And grace is free, Pardon there is multiplied to me, There my burdened soul finds liberty, At Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I’ve given to Jesus everything, Now I gladly own Him as my King, Now my raptured soul can only sing Of Calvary.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, the love that drew salvation’s plan, Oh, the grace that brought it down to man. Oh, the mighty gulf that God did span At Calvary.{/lang-eng}
